alert.name: Time since last backup job alert

targets.expr: sum(bareos_pool_bytes{prunable="true", instance=~"$instance"}) by(pool) + sum(bareos_pool_bytes{prunable="false", expired="true", instance=~"$instance"}) by (pool)
sum(bareos_pool_volumes{prunable="true", instance=~"$instance"}) by(pool) + sum(bareos_pool_volumes{prunable="false", expired="true", instance=~"$instance"}) by (pool)
